sentences.en: At least " bailout " is a better phrase than " handout " which was also being tossed around.
sentences.cn: “ 保释 ” 这个词至少比当时到处滥用的 “ 施舍 ” 这个词要好些.

sentences.en: Each family is being given a cash handout of six thousand rupees.
sentences.cn: 每户都领到6,000卢比的救济金。

sentences.en: Here is Professor Johnson's handout on English literature in the 1920 s.
sentences.cn: 这是约翰逊教授关于20世纪20年代英国文学的讲稿.
我仔细看了这份分发的资料.

sentences.en: Large group workshop on Revision # 1 . Essay 2 discussed; theory handout.
sentences.cn: 修改作品 #.的大组讨论工作坊. 讨论文章2; 理论讲义.

sentences.en: Large group workshop on Revision # 1. Essay 2 discussed; theory handout.
sentences.cn: 6修改作品 # 1.的大组讨论工作坊. 讨论文章2; 理论讲义.

sentences.en: people who have to live on handouts from the state
sentences.cn: 必须依赖国家发放的救济金生活的人们

sentences.en: She came to me asking for a handout.
She was so proud that she would not accept any handout.
sentences.cn: 她很有自尊心,不愿接受任何施舍.

sentences.en: Some lush merchant sat by the door waiting for a handout.
sentences.cn: 有个酒鬼坐在门外边等着施舍.

sentences.en: Stuff your money. We don't want a handout.
sentences.cn: 收起你的钱，我们不需要施舍。

sentences.en: The bag lady never asked for a handout.
sentences.cn: 那个无家可归的老妇从不乞求施舍.

sentences.en: The phrase means to beg, to ask for a handout.
sentences.cn: 这个说法的意思是乞求或请求别人施舍.

sentences.en: The president called foreign aid a handout that fosters dependence on wealthy nations.
sentences.cn: 总统认为外援是不劳而获之财，会助长本国对富国的依赖性。

sentences.en: This is only a sort of handout. You may take it with a grain of salt.
sentences.cn: 这只是一份分发的资料,你大可以不必相信.

words.tran_cn: 散发材料（免费发给的新闻通报）；上课老师发的印刷品；文字资料 	（会议上分发的）；施舍物

trans.tran_cn: 救济品，施舍物，印刷品，讲义
trans.tran_en: money or goods that are given to someone, for example because they are poor
